title: Report and requests made in relation Poole Place

content:
Dear Sheffield City Council,
Under the Freedom of Information Act I request the following in relation to the entire street named "Poole Place" which has the postcode S9 4JR. For clarity this is a Cul de sac compromising of a total of 32 houses with a single entrance and exit off Prince of Wales Road.
Please provide all information dating from January 2019 until the present day 24/04/2025 in relation to the above named street to include:
- All requests made to any Council departments to include but not limited to the Highways department, relating to the upkeep of the street. This is to include but not limited to, surfacing or resurfacing, grants approved and provided to residents of Poole Place to include Door numbers, application for "dropped kerbs", applications for planning permissions of any kind, any requests relating to the highway, footpath, street lighting, sewage works etc. Please note this is to include any and all requests, whether approved/granted or not.
- All reports and/or complaints made in relation to any property/persons on Poole Place. Please include unredacted copies of the complaint, the name where not anonymised of the complainant, the name where not anonymised of the person complained about, the addresses affected.
-All reports/complaints made in relation to the street as a whole, parts of the street, any aspect that is not limited to an individual property. Please include unredacted copies of the complaint, the name where not anonymised of the complainant, the name where not anonymised of the person complained about, the addresses affected.
- Please provide all intelligence received by SCC provided by the public, whether named or anonymised, that has led to the intervention of an officer, to include site visits, phone calls, letters etc
- Please provide all reports made by any individual alleging a contravention of any code, law, rule whether proven or not.
- Please provide a breakdown of all council funds spent on any aspect of poole place, be it the street or an individual property, since at least 2019 but dating back to 2014 where possible. To include grants given to individual properties.
I appreciate the request is large. Please provide any information as soon as possible even if there is still information outstanding.
Yours faithfully,
Adam G

Dear Adam G,
Thank you for your request for information relating to Poole Place which
we received on 24/04/2025.
As your request is a request for information relating to the environment,
this has been logged as a request under the Environmental Information
Regulations 2004 (EIR) and will be dealt with under the Regulations. The
reference number for your request can be found above.
The Environmental Information Regulations 2004 state that we must respond
to you within 20 working days, by 23/05/2025. Please do not hesitate to
contact us at the email address below if you have any queries.
Please note that from 1^st January 2025, as part of our commitment to
improving services, the council will accept EIR requests via the online
form which can be found here:
